import axios from 'axios' import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import Footer from './Footer' import Header from './Header' function Cart() { useEffect(()=>{getCartData()},[]) const navigate = useNavigate() const [cartData, setCartData] = useState([]) const getCartData=()=>{ axios.get("http://localhost:5001/api/cart").then((res)=>setCartData(res.data.data)) } const deleteCartData = (x) =>{ axios.delete("http://localhost:5001/api/cart/"+ x).then(()=>getCartData()) } return (
Your Cart
{cartData.map((i)=> )}
Product Price Quality Total
{i?.brand}
Rs.{i?.price}
) } export default Cart
